tasks.title: Supabase Schema, RLS & Anonymous Auth
tasks.description: Create relational schema (profiles, projects, sheets, parts), enable anonymous sign-in, and enforce free-tier quotas via row-level security.
details: id uuid primary key references auth.users(id) on delete cascade,
id uuid primary key default gen_random_uuid(),
owner uuid not null references auth.users(id),
id uuid primary key default gen_random_uuid(),
project_id uuid not null references projects(id) on delete cascade,
id uuid primary key default gen_random_uuid(),
project_id uuid not null references projects(id) on delete cascade,
alter table projects enable row level security;
alter table sheets   enable row level security;
alter table parts    enable row level security;
using  ( project_id in (select id from projects where owner = auth.uid()) )
with check ( project_id in (select id from projects where owner = auth.uid()) );
using  ( project_id in (select id from projects where owner = auth.uid()) )
with check ( project_id in (select id from projects where owner = auth.uid()) );
( select count(*) from projects where owner = auth.uid() ) < 5
or exists (select 1 from profiles p where p.id = auth.uid() and p.role = 'pro')
where project_id in (select id from projects where owner = auth.uid())
or exists (select 1 from profiles p where p.id = auth.uid() and p.role = 'pro')
( select count(*) from parts where project_id = new.project_id ) < 50
or exists (select 1 from profiles p where p.id = auth.uid() and p.role = 'pro')

tasks.title: /workbench UI & Data Flow
tasks.description: Create page with inputs, toolbar, live preview wiring inputs→optimizer→visualisation.
tasks.details:
Components:
• PartsTable – editable rows (id,w,h,qty)
• SheetSettings – width/height fields
• Toolbar – ‘Optimize’, ‘Export PDF’, quota meter
• LayoutPreview – mounts SvgCanvas component
State flow (Zustand):
```
const useStore=create(()=>({parts:[],sheet:{W:2440,H:1220},layout:[], optimize(){...}}));
```
Calls `optimize()` (task 4) in worker, sets `layout`.
Handles anonymous quota readings from Supabase via RPC `get_usage()`.
tasks.testStrategy:
• React Testing Library – enter 3 parts, click Optimize, SVG populated.
• Playwright: on free tier, try >50 parts and expect upgrade modal.
• Accessibility: axe-core no violations on page.

tasks.title: Paywall & Quota Enforcement
tasks.description: Gate advanced usage; surface ‘Link identity’ and ‘Upgrade’ flows triggered by RLS errors or client counts.
tasks.details:

• When over limit, show Modal with summary and buttons: ‘Sign-in to save’, ‘Buy Pass’ (opens pricing).

tasks.testStrategy:
